hello_world.title: Hello World
hello_world.author: Adam K Dean
hello_world.content:
The idea here is that you'll put the newest blog post at the top.

Hopefully that won't be a problem. Sure you have to write your blog posts in JSON but surely that's a positive, not a negative... we shall see.

More functionality could be added but this is, of course, a simple app.
